touchstone, 45-54 Male  on Treatment for 1 to 6 months (Patient)
column9: After a bicycle accident that injured three discs in my cervical spine I had lots of pain and neck muscle soreness. While the daytime presence of these symptoms was relatively manageable, the disruption of my sleep was very problematic. I started using 1000mg of Robaxin (methcarbamol) with 400mg of ibuprofen at night and my sleep has been sound and mostly restful. While I can't attest to daytime use, I've got to say that the combination of these two has given me an overall improved quality of sleep, much better than sleeping medications!

column2: Paramedic, 45-54 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: I had two weeks of extreme neck stiffness and pain with vertigo type symptoms, this medication has dramatically reduced the muscle spasm and stiffness which significantly diminished the vertigo. Must be taken with physical therapy to get the complete relief, heat adds increased comfort. Chronic bad posture and hydration must be addressed for long term success. Keep in mind that this is muscle relaxer, does nothing for actual vertebral or joint degeneration.
